item.title: You’re not as loosely coupled as you think!
item.description: When you hear tight coupling or being loosely coupled, what does that even mean? There are many aspects to coupling that you need to think about. Temporal, Data Schema, Location, Technology. Removing one aspect usually involves having to deal with a whole new set of problems. YouTube Check out my YouTube channel, where I post all kinds… Read More »You’re not as loosely coupled as you think! The post You’re not as loosely coupled as you think!
